text:
Joe Mazzulla on Celtics 4th Quarter COLLAPSE | Postgame Interview
The Celtics fall short in thrilling 117-116 loss to 76ers. Joe Mazzulla on what happened in the last 4 minutes: â€œTransition opportunities ... 40-50% of Maxey's points came in transition and at the free-throw line."
